name: New Super Chick Sisters
storyline: Chick sisters Nugget and Chickette have to save Pamela Anderson again. This time Pam has been kidnapped by the evil mascot of McDonald's, Ronald McDonald, who plans to turn her into an unhappy meal along with tortured chickens. On the other side, Mario and Luigi are simply too busy creating video games to rescue Pamela.
summary: PETA's boycott of McDonald's chicken nuggets and other items on the menu. A Flash game sequel to "Super Chick Sisters" once again featuring the two feathered siblings as they save Pamela Anderson from Ronald McDonald.
